text: John David McAfee (September 18, 1945 - June 23, 2021) was a British and American computer programmer. He was the developer of the first commercial anti-virus program. This bore the McAfee brand-name for years, until it was bought by Intel and given the Intel name. ==Early life== McAfee was born in an U.S. Army base stationed in the United Kingdom. He was raised in Virginia and Alabama. ==Business career== His wealth peaked at $100 million, before his investments suffered in the global crisis of 2007. McAfee also had interests in smartphone apps, yoga and all-natural antibiotics. ==Political career== On September 8, 2015, McAfee announced that he would seek the office of President of the United States in the 2016 presidential election as the candidate of a newly formed political party called the Cyber Party. On December 24, 2015 he re-announced his candidacy bid, saying that he would instead seek the Libertarian nomination for President. On June 4, 2018, McAfee announced his plans to run for president as a Libertarian in the 2020 presidential election. ==Death== On June 23, 2021, McAfee was found dead after committing suicide by hanging in a prison cell in Sant Esteve Sesrovires near Barcelona. Hours before his death, Spain approved for McAfee to be extradited to the United States for tax crimes. ==References== ==Other websites== * John McAfee's website * McAfee's 2016 presidential campaign website * John McAfee on Facebook * * * Bio on NNDB * "Zone Labs To Get Funding, New Board Member" , InformationWeek, October 2, 2000 Category:2020 United States vice-presidential candidates Category:2020 United States presidential candidates Category:2016 United States presidential candidates Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American computer scientists Category:Scientists from Virginia Category:Politicians from Virginia Category:Scientists from Tennessee Category:Politicians from Tennessee Category:Libertarian Party (United States) politicians Category:Honorary Knights Commander of the Order of the British Empire Category:Suicides by hanging Category:People who died in prison custody Category:People from Gloucestershire
title: John McAfee
